# Introduction

This is essentially the github package for functions we have done throughout the semester, with some data as well.

## Scatterhist

```{r}
with(ddt, scatterhist(LENGTH,WEIGHT, xlab="LENGTH"))
```

## Uniform Central Limit Theorem

```{r}
mycltu(n=3, iter=10000, a = 0, b = 10)
```

## Hypergeometric Simulation

```{r}
myhyper(iter=100,n=5, N=20,r=12)
```

## Bootstrap Function

```{r}
sam=rnorm(20,mean=10,sd=2)
myboot(iter=10000, x=sam, fun="mean", alpha=0.05, xlab="mean")
```
